Room.Name: Jade Room
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the Jade room of the Wizard's Eye.
Room.LongDescription: Glistening jade in rich carvings set in ivory pillars distinguishes the room. The room is cut in triangular shapes of all sizes, each piece meshing with the next one, forming a geodesic structure of jade and ivory columns at odd angles. A jade tiger, wearing a red robe, paces the floor.
